text: Sassafras is an unincorporated community in Clark Township, Perry County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== A post office called Sassafras was established in 1916, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1957. The community was named for a grove of sassafras trees near the original town site. ==Geography== Sassafras is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Perry County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Sassafras, Indiana
